mapper.sql: id, `name`, image, order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, `number`, amount
mapper.insert:
insert into order_detail (id, `name`, image, order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, `number`, amount) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dishId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.setmealId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dishFlavor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
